projects.name: Health and Fitness App
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive health and tness app designed to empower users to achieve their wellness goals. The app offers personalized workout routines, nutritional tracking, progress monitoring, and motivational features to promote a healthy lifestyle. Utilized user-friendly interface design and integrated data analytics to enhance user engagement and satisfaction.

projects.name: Student Management System
projects.description: Engineered a student management system facilitating efcient administration and organization within educational institutions. This system features modules for student enrollment, course scheduling, grades management, and reporting functionalities. Implemented intuitive user interfaces and seamless integration with databases to streamline administrative tasks and enhance communication between faculty, students, and administrators.

projects.name: Edu-Venture
projects.description: It is a flutter that is made to track students attendance. It includes modules for attendance tracking, notes sharing, doubt solving, parents-teacher co-ordination, tests, etc.

projects.name: Sui-DhaagaJi
projects.description: A web application made for IDF to provide jobs for women in remote areas.

experiences.description: During my internship, I gained prociency in web development, successfully creating company webpages tailored to specic requirements.

I was hired as an assistant to a senior application developer. My task were to develop some parts of the application using flutter and learn more about flutter application development from my seniors. I was also, for a short period of time, working with the web development team.
Developed a Web Application Project to provide jobs to women in remote areas. Developed the front end of this web application and helped in the backend.
